sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const PostDetail = ()=>{ const params = useParams(); console.log(params.id) useEffect(()=>{ getPost(); }) const getPost= async()=>{ let post = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/posts/getPost/${params.id}`) console.log(post); } return( <>

user

post.createdAt

category

post title

body

#horizontalimage #image #{post.category}

{post.comments.length}

{likecount}

) } export default PostDetail;
